name: Abominaballs Ladies Tee
description:
Based on the Daddy Abominaball print. This design is printed on a ladies 'Gildan' slim t-shirt. 100% cotton.

Charcoal colour

Comes in 4 sizes. Small, Medium, Large, X Large.
Up and coming Adelaide illustrator Cohen Gum creates artwork that explodes off the canvas. His zany, vibrant characters create a mix of emotions. Underneath their happy, joyous exteriors belies something quite dark and peculiar. Cohen's work is created digitally and he has extended his range into clothing, furniture and accessories.

www.cohengum.com.au

name: Cuddles Mens Tee
description:
A variation of the mouth hugging Cuddles print. This design is printed on a men's 'Gildan' slim t-shirt. 100% cotton.

Sand colour

Comes in 4 sizes. Small, Medium, Large, X Large.
Up and coming Adelaide illustrator Cohen Gum creates artwork that explodes off the canvas. His zany, vibrant characters create a mix of emotions. Underneath their happy, joyous exteriors belies something quite dark and peculiar. Cohen's work is created digitally and he has extended his range into clothing, furniture and accessories.

www.cohengum.com.au

name: Red Chaise
description:
The centrepiece of the Creepy Cute Exhibition. This chaise was lovingly re-upholstered by the very talented John Clark, a master upholsterer with over 30 years industry experience.

Combining a new paint job, custom fabric and art direction by Cohen, the chaise has been given a new lease on life. A gothic masterpiece with a happy twist.

1.7m length x 1m height
.7m width

Postage: Local pickup only.
Up and coming Adelaide illustrator Cohen Gum creates artwork that explodes off the canvas. His zany, vibrant characters create a mix of emotions. Underneath their happy, joyous exteriors belies something quite dark and peculiar. Cohen's work is created digitally and he has extended his range into clothing, furniture and accessories.

www.cohengum.com.au

name: Goggles Print
description:
Goggles is a rare species of fish that lures prey using its 'cute as a button' antennae. It then proceeds to to tear its mesmerised victims to bloody pieces.

Giclee prints on acid free, fine art, pearl paper (285gsm). A3 size in length.

Shipped rolled in thick tube. $10.00 postage Australia wide. $30.00 international.
Up and coming Australian illustrator Cohen Gum creates artwork that explodes off the canvas. His zany, vibrant characters create a mix of emotions. Underneath their happy, joyous exteriors belies something quite dark and peculiar. Cohen's work is created digitally and he has extended his range into clothing, furniture and accessories.

www.cohengum.com.au

name: Abominaball Pendant
description:
This cute pendant is Cohen Gum's abominaball design, taken over by Minnette Michael and turned wearable.

It is made from hand cut (no laser-cutting here) brass that has been powder-coated black and is hanging on a long (approx 75cm) sterling silver chain.

Pendant approx. 6cm x 6cm
Adelaide based contemporary jeweller Minnette Michael creates using a wide variety of materials and combines many different processes, some jewellery, some craft and some industry. Her 'Creepy Cute' designs were inspired by her love of nanna crafts and Cohen Gum's illustrations.

www.minnette.com.au

description:

It is made from hand cut (no laser-cutting here) brass that has been powder-coated black and has a handmade stainless steel brooch pin on the back.

Approx. 4cm x 4cm

name: Stompy Print
description:

Giclee prints on acid free, fine art, pearl paper (285gsm). A2 size.

description:
